# zero

**Type Property**

An offset structure with no offset in the horizontal and vertical directions.

## Declaration

```swift
static let zero: UIOffset
```

## Discussion

This constant represents a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIOffset] structure whose [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIOffset/horizontal] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIOffset/vertical] fields are `0`.
